name: Provision of Certificates and test results
Surface checks of formwork and column dimensions - as per design drawings
Place reinforcement as per design drawings on Column Encasement
Required mesh secured with pins as per structural drawings
Inspection of shotcrete wall and/or Column
Visual inspection to verify Mesh/Steel is as per structural drawings
Onsite slump and visual testing by qualified concrete tester (4 Cylinders required for testing)
Place shotcrete no less than the minimum thickness and cover as per structural drawings
Design Strength of Concrete as noted on the structural drawing
Sponge Finish c/w expansion and construction joints as per structural drawings
